Training and Workshops

Good data visualization leverages our strengths in visual perception, mitigates our cognitive weaknesses, and complements our existing analytical approaches. We empower people to apply these concepts to their own visual analyses.

About Us

Good data visualization leverages our strengths in visual perception, mitigates our cognitive weaknesses, and complements our existing analytical approaches. We empower people to apply these concepts to their own visual analyses.
